name: BROWN BEAR

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The bear makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

raw_text:
AC 11 	Initiative +1 (11)
HP 22 (3d10 + 6)
Speed 40 ft., Climb 30 ft.
Large Beast, Unaligned
